hotels.vendor_name: The Chase Park Plaza Royal Sonesta St Louis
hotels.title: St. Louis Art Deco City Break with Three Restaurants & Historic Movie Theatre
hotels.description: Delight in a stay in vibrant St. Louis at The Chase Park Plaza Royal Sonesta St. Louis, a city icon on the fringes of Forest Park, the Central Park of the Midwest. With the huge leafy park and Central West End's bustling restaurants, bars and shopping on its doorstep, this hotel places you in a prime location for the best spots in St. Louis. The hotel is grand, exuding old-world glamour through its Art Deco design, historic onsite five-screen movie theatre, Mediterranean-style swimming pool and The Tenderloin Room steakhouse - a St. Louis institution since the 1960s - while two additional trendy onsite restaurants and a huge fitness centre catapult it into the present.
